prodNameC: 邦迪斯 大鼠肝、腎、胃免疫螢光染色套組/玻片
prodNameE: The Binding Site RAT LIVER KIDNEY, STOMACH IFA KIT/SLIDES
ingredientsDesc:
1. Rat liver, kidney, stomach sections on 5- or 10-well slides.
KITS ONLY :
2. ANA homogeneous positive control serum containing 0.099% sodium azide. 
3. Negative control serum containing 0.099% sodium azide.
4. Affinity purified sheep anti-human IgG (H+L) fluorescein isothiocyanate (FITC) conjugate 
containing 0.099% sodium azide.
5.Mitochondria1 positive control serum, containing 0.099% sodium azide.
6. Smooth muscle positive control serum, containing 0.099% sodium azide.
7. 1% Evans Blue Optional counterstain.
8. Phosphate buffered saline (PBS), a 20-fold concentrate in liquid form.
9. Blotters, to blot the slides after washing.
10. Mounting medium, containing an anti-fading agent (DABCO) 1,4 diazabicyclo [2.2.2] octane.
11. Coverslips (22 x 70mm).
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區康寧街169巷25號13樓
efficacy: 本分析套組用於體外篩檢與滴定人類血清中抗核抗體 (anti-nuclear antibodies, ANA)、抗粒線體抗體 (anti-mitochondrial antibodies, AMA)、抗平滑肌抗體 (anti-smooth muscle antibodies, ASMA)與抗胃壁細胞抗體 (anti-gastric parietal cell antibodies, AGPCA) 自體抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
